channel.title: CVE Feed for sethshoultes -- Event Espresso – Event Registration & Ticketing Sales
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sethshoultes -- Event Espresso – Event Registration & Ticketing Sales

item.title: CVE-2024-6883|2024-08-21T13:17:20.489Z -- sethshoultes -- event%20espresso%20%E2%80%93%20event%20registration%20%26%20ticketing%20sales
item.description: The Event Espresso 4 Decaf – Event Registration Event Ticketing plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to limited unauthorized plugin settings modification due to a missing capability check on the saveTimezoneString and some other functions in all versions up to, and including, 5.0.22.decaf. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to modify some of the plugin settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-6883|2024-08-21T05:30:21.157Z -- sethshoultes -- event%20espresso%20%E2%80%93%20event%20registration%20%26%20ticketing%20sales
item.description: The Event Espresso 4 Decaf – Event Registration Event Ticketing plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to limited unauthorized plugin settings modification due to a missing capability check on the saveTimezoneString and some other functions in all versions up to, and including, 5.0.22.decaf. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to modify some of the plugin settings.
